articles.author: Kevin Purdy
articles.title: Metal Slug Tactics is an odd mix of arcade shooter and grid strategy that works - Ars Technica
articles.description: Fusing the look and feel of the classic 2D shooter series to the painstaking planning of an isometric tactics game? Yeah, okay, it somehow plays.

articles.author: Chance Miller
articles.title: Rumor: Apple developing 90Hz display tech for iPad Air, Studio Display, and iMac - 9to5Mac
articles.description: A new rumor today suggests Apple is developing a 90Hz display that could be destined for the iPad Air, 24-inch...
articles.content:
A new rumor today suggests Apple is developing a 90Hz display that could be destined for the iPad Air, 24-inch iMac, and Studio Display. 
The rumor comes from an anonymous source who reached out to … [+1354 chars]
